Banon
Name: Greg Hovey (Banon)
Immorted: ~February 97 or 98
Job: Havok's Head Coder
Level: 60
Email: Hoveyg@hotmail.com
WebSite: www.geocities.com/havok_mud/
Zones Completed: Knight  and Day, Groves of Discontent, Moria Extension, Ice Caverns, Sundhaven(Stock Zone but brought to Havok by Banon), QuestHaven(Incomplete).

Description

Initially Banon started as a lowly dwarven Cleric/Warrior but over the years has slowly risen the ranks to become one of Havok's greater influences.  Through his time as an immortal, he has contributed various thing to help Havok become one of the best MUDs around.  Some of this includes the various number of zones he's completed in the past as well as the extensive coding done.
